  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Manage",
  "description": "Binary Consulting, an HR service company,&nbsp;is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager - Teacher Education &amp; Development

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a Social media manager passionate about education and storytelling.


Responsibilities


	Curate and produce powerful stories from the field: teacher&#39;s journey, classroom transformation, student impact.
	Actively engage with followers.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess B.Sc. Degrees
	Minimum 2 years of experience in social media management in the non-profit, education sector.
	Great writing and story telling skills.
	Basic graphics design skills.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-25",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-08",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Binary Consulting Limited"
    
  },

    "@type": "Place",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

  },

      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Social Media Manage Job at Binary Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Binary Consulting, an HR service company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager - Teacher Education & Development

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a Social media manager passionate about education and storytelling.


Responsibilities


	Curate and produce powerful stories from the field: teacher's journey, classroom transformation, student impact.
	Actively engage with followers.


Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidates should possess B.Sc. Degrees
	Minimum 2 years of experience in social media management in the non-profit, education sector.
	Great writing and story telling skills.
	Basic graphics design skills.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Accountant",
  "description": "Binary Consulting, an HR service company,&nbsp;is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
The ideal candidate for this role is expected to:


	Possess 4&ndash;5 years of relevant accounting experience, particularly in the banking or health sector
	Be well-spoken and able to communicate financial information to non-financial stakeholders
	Have a professional certification (e.g., ICAN, ACCA)
	Be experienced in generating management reports, managing receivables, and debt control
	Demonstrate a sound understanding of accounting processes and internal controls
	Have working experience with Health Maintenance Organizations (HMOs).
",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-25",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-11",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Binary Consulting Limited"
    
  },

Senior Accountant Job at Binary Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Binary Consulting, an HR service company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
The ideal candidate for this role is expected to:
     

            
    




	Possess 4–5 years of relevant accounting experience, particularly in the banking or health sector
	Be well-spoken and able to communicate financial information to non-financial stakeholders
	Have a professional certification (e.g., ICAN, ACCA)
	Be experienced in generating management reports, managing receivables, and debt control
	Demonstrate a sound understanding of accounting processes and internal controls
	Have working experience with Health Maintenance Organizations (HMOs).
    

    

        Click here to Apply
